childMdx.excerpt: Walk the lighthouse keeper's path right  to the point beyond where they tell you you can't go.   There's a small cave there you can shelter…
The birds sing me back together, rising into a night whose darkness proves time had a dawn and will draw to a close, but not before a soft…
No-one wrote this dedication. No-one will ever read it.   Truth took me and I said: You are my teacher.   One real laugh returned, resigned…
